codeSystems.name: DiagnosisVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of the Diagnostic Evidence Base
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet indicates which diagnostic evidence base was used for its realization

codeSystems.name: DischDestVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Discharge Location
codeSystems.description: Discharge destination following acute care hospitalization. What type of place was the patient discharged to?

codeSystems.name: EstStrokeSevNIHSSCatVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet that categorizes the estimated severity of the stroke using the NIHSS according to the ICHOM standard.
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet is intended to categorize the severity of the stroke based on the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

codeSystems.name: GenderIdentityVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Gender Identity
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Gender Identity based on LOINC.

codeSystems.name: LiveAlonePreVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Live Alone Pre-Stroke
codeSystems.description: ValueSet indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

codeSystems.name: LivingLocPreVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
codeSystems.description: Represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

codeSystems.name: NoYesUnknownVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet Yes, No and Unknown
codeSystems.description: ValueSet with responses Yes, No, and Unknown

codeSystems.name: PROMIS10VS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet defines the response values for the PROMIS-10 (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System 10-item short form) Questionnaire.

codeSystems.name: SMRSqVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (SMRSq)
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet defines the response values for the simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire.

codeSystems.name: SmokingStatusVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Smoking Status
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

codeSystems.name: StrokeAmbVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation.

codeSystems.name: StrokeDressingVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing.

codeSystems.name: StrokeSevLocVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet Categorizing the State of Consciousness according to the ICHOM standard.
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet is based on the ICHOM standard and it indicates the patient's state of consciousness as measured upon arrival at the reference hospital.

codeSystems.name: StrokeToiletingVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting.

codeSystems.name: StrokeTypeVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet for stroke type based on ICHOM
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet aims to categorize the stroke type according to the ICHOM standard.

codeSystems.name: SymtDurVS
codeSystems.title: ValueSet Categorizing the Duration of Stroke Symptoms
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that categorizes the duration of stroke symptoms, considering the time from symptom onset to admission at the reference hospital.

codeSystems.name: CNES_ValueSet
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of National Registry of Health Establishments (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimentos de Saúde)
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet details codes for Stroke Healthcare Units in Joinville based on National Registry of Health Establishments (CNES - Cadastro Nacional de Estabelecimentos de Saúde).

codeSystems.name: HospitalDepartment_ValueSet
codeSystems.title: ValueSet for Hospital Department
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet includes the hospital departments responsible for taking care of stroke patients.

codeSystems.name: CardiovascularComorbidities_ValueSet
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Cardiovascular Comorbidities
codeSystems.description: Indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with. Select all conditions that apply at every annual follow-up.

codeSystems.name: MolicAVC_ReferenceLocation_ValueSet
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Reference Location
codeSystems.description: Indicate and classify where the patient was referred.

codeSystems.name: ProfessionalCode_ValueSet
codeSystems.title: ValueSet of Professional Code
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet is integral to the Molic-AVC project and details codes for professionals serving stroke patients in Brazil.

codeSystems.name: MolicAVC_CodeHealthcareUnitValueSet
codeSystems.title: Type of Healthcare Unit ValueSet
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet details codes for healthcare units serving stroke patients in Brazil.
